Function Documentation

function recon_qual ( in  rec_obj,
in  Ep_Pha,
in  S_Pha,
in  Cm,
in   
)

recon_qual calculates norms for image (permittivity distribution), sensitivity matrix and measurement recon_qual calculates norms for image (permittivity distribution), sensitivity matrix and measurement the discrepancy (normalized square norm) 1.

between numerical phantom or model and reconstructed image 2. between sensitivity matrix for phantom and sensitivity matrix for solution estimate 3. between measured values and reprojected using current solution estimate

Parameters:
Ep_Pha permittivity distribution of numerical phantom or model
S_Pha sensitivity matrix calculated for phantom or model
Cm measurements - real values
Ep_0 permittivity distribution of initial (start) solution Ep(0)
S_0 sensitivity matrix calculated for initial solution Ep(0)
Cr_0 measurements - reprojected values for initial solution Ep(0)
Ep permittivity distribution - current solution estimate Ep(i)
S sensitivity matrix calculated for current solution estimate S(i)
Cr measurements - reprojected values for current solution Ep(i)
scale '2one' to scaling to 1 or 'norm' to normalize
Return values:
Cap_err vector of normalized L2 distance in measurement domain
Imag_err vector of normalized L2 distance in image domain
Sens_err vector of normalized L2 distance between models
